snippet: A man wearing a burqa detonated a bomb outside the main market in the capital, Ndjamena, on Saturday, killing 14 people, a police spokesman said.
lead_paragraph: A man wearing a burqa detonated a bomb outside the main market in the capital, Ndjamena, on Saturday, killing 14 people, a police spokesman said.

headline.main: Chad: Bomber Kills at Least 14 People
headline.print_headline: Chad: Bomber Kills at Least 14 People
